document_data.name: Jaws of Suzail
document_data.mainbody: '''The Jaws''' was the stream that fed into [[Lake Azoun]] and after entering a culvert, drained into [[Suzail]]'s commercial deepwater harbor called [[the Basin]].
document_data.Geography:
As of the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], the Jaws entered the city of Suzail from beyond its northeastern walls, trickled north and expanded into Lake Azoun on the southern side of [[Castle Obarskyr]]. From the lake, it hooked back north around the [[Court Close]] and moved back south until turning into a culvert on the opposite side of the block where [[the Winking Eye]] stood.

By the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, the Jaws' length was greatly shortened. The stream's culvert tunnel began between Castle Obarskyr
and Cormyr's Royal Court, with the rest of the stream paved and built over.
document_data.Notable Locations:
*[[Cormaeril Compound]], the estate of the noble [[House Cormaeril]] that stood across the [[Royal Ride]] from Greatgaunt Estate.
*[[Greatgaunt Estate]], the manor of the noble [[House Greatgaunt]], before the 15{{th}} century DR – the estate of [[House Wyvernspur]]. It stood to the south of Rowanmantle Castle.
*[[The Refuge]], the magical refuge monitored by the Royal Magician and created by Magister [[Maldiglas Turntower]]. It was hidden nearby the [[Tower of the Royal Magician]], on the southern shore of the Jaws.
*[[Rowanmantle Castle]], the home estate of the noble [[House Rowanmantle]] stood on the western side of the Jaws as the stream entered Suzail.{{Cite dungeon/198/Backdrop: Suzail|65-66}}
*[[Royal Gardens]] and Castle Obarskyr – the Dragon Throne of Cormyr.
*[[Thistleflame Manor]], the fortified gated keep, home of the noble [[Thistle (family)|Thistle]] family of Suzail stood across the Jaws from the Cormaeril Compound.
